pullRequest.title: EPL-2 and contribute.md
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR changes the code license from EPL 1.0 to EPL 2.0 and adds a Contribute.md file.
see eclipse/xtext#1176

afterCommit.message:
Changed license from EPL-1 to EPL-2 and contribute.md

Signed-off-by: Sven Efftinge <sven.efftinge@typefox.io>

beforeCommit.message:
Changed license from EPL-1 to EPL-2 and contribute.md

Signed-off-by: Sven Efftinge <sven.efftinge@typefox.io>

beforeCommit.message:
Changed license from EPL-1 to EPL-2 and contribute.md

afterCommit.message:
EPL1.0 -> EPL2.0 and contribute.md

Signed-off-by: Sven Efftinge <sven.efftinge@typefox.io>

nodes.bodyText: The genmodel files still contain the old header.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <genmodel:GenModel xmi:version="2.0" xmlns:xmi="http://www.omg.org/XMI" xmlns:ecore="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore"
-    xmlns:genmodel="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/GenModel" copyrightText="Copyright (c) 2016, 2017 TypeFox GmbH (http://www.typefox.io) and others.
All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials
are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0
which accompanies this distribution, and is available at
http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html"
+    xmlns:genmodel="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/GenModel" copyrightText="Copyright (c) 2016, 2017 TypeFox GmbH (http://www.typefox.io) and others.
All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials
are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v2.0
which accompanies this distribution, and is available at
http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0"

nodes.bodyText: The test expectation does no longer match
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -49,30 +50,30 @@ class EMFGeneratorFragment2Test {
 		assertTrim('''
 		Copyright (c) 2011, 2019 itemis AG (http://www.itemis.eu) and others.
 		All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials
-		are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0
+		are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v2.0
 		which accompanies this distribution, and is available at
-		http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html''',
+		http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0''',
 		'''
 		/**
 		 * Copyright (c) 2011, 2019 itemis AG (http://www.itemis.eu) and others.
 		 * All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials
 		 * are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0

nodes.bodyText: I'm not sure about the newly committed preferences.
The file header in the prefs is not up-to-date yet
The file header in the plugin.properties has an outdated license header.
The ext file has an outdated header.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,9 +1,9 @@
 /*******************************************************************************
 * Copyright (c) 2008 itemis AG and others.
 * All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials

beforeCommit.message: Updated headers in a few remaining files

afterCommit.message: Updated headers in a few remaining files

commit.message:
EPL1.0 -> EPL2.0 and contribute.md

Signed-off-by: Sven Efftinge <sven.efftinge@typefox.io>
Recompiled all xtend-code to sync whitespace
Updated copyright format in jdt templates
Updated headers in a few remaining files

beforeCommit.message: Updated headers in a few remaining files

afterCommit.message: Updated headers in a few remaining files
